method.name: ActivateOK
method.summary: Determine if OK to begin Activate.
method.returns: True if OK to begin Activate.

method.name: DeactivateOK
method.summary: Determine if OK to begin Deactivate.
method.returns: True if OK to begin Deactivate.

method.name: InitializeOK
method.summary: Determine if OK to begin Initialize.
method.returns: True if OK to begin Initialize.

method.name: StartingOK
method.summary: Determine if OK to begin Starting.
method.returns: True if OK to begin Starting.

method.name: StartOK
method.summary: Determine if OK to begin Start.
method.returns: True if OK to begin Start.

method.name: StartedOK
method.summary: Determine if OK to begin Started.
method.returns: True if OK to begin Started.

method.name: StoppingOK
method.summary: Determine if OK to begin Stopping.
method.returns: True if OK to begin Stopping.

method.name: StopOK
method.summary: Determine if OK to begin Stop.
method.returns: True if OK to begin Stop.

method.name: StoppedOK
method.summary: Determine if OK to begin Stopped.
method.returns: True if OK to begin Stopped.

method.name: StartHostOK
method.summary: Determine if OK to begin StartHost.
method.returns: True if OK to begin StartHost.

method.name: StopHostOK
method.summary: Determine if OK to begin StopHost.
method.returns: True if OK to begin StopHost.

method.name: ToActive
method.returns: True if State changed to Active.

method.name: ToInActive
method.returns: True if State changed to InActive.

method.name: ToInitialized
method.returns: True if State changed to Initialized.

method.name: ToError
method.returns: True if State changed to Error.

method.name: ToStarting
method.returns: True if State changed to Starting.

method.name: ToStopping
method.returns: True if State changed to Stopping.

method.name: ToUnInitialized
method.returns: True if State changed to UnInitialized.
